product_name: Topeak TrolleyTote Folding MTX Rear Bicycle Basket
long_description: The Topeak TrolleyTote Folding MTX rear bicycle basket secures to your Topeak MTX rear rack (sold separately) and is perfect for around-town shopping and errands. TrolleyTote features a telescopic handle and trolley wheels for easy handling off the bike. Large-capacity, durable frame collapses for easy storage. The Trolley Tote is QuickTrack ready, and installs quickly and easily with a slide and a click to all Topeak MTX series racks. Features a rear clip for a safety light, sold separately. Please note: max. cargo weight capacity is 19 lbs. 12 oz.
short_description: The Topeak TrolleyTote Folding MTX rear bicycle basket secures to your Topeak MTX rear rack (sold separately) and is perfect for around-town shopping and errands.
